Uses of Interface
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.PackageDescription

Packages that use PackageDescription
Package
Description
info.oais.infomodel.implementation
This module provides implementations of the classes defined in OAIS with minimum additions for the OAIS-IF Reference Implementation.
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
This module provides interfaces defined in the OAIS Information Model.

    Subinterfaces of PackageDescription in info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    CollectionDescription
    A type of Package Description that is specialized to provide information about an Archival Information Collection (or an Access Collection) for use by Access Aids [OAIS].
